name: EventSlice
overview:
We help people put the pieces together for extraordinary events! EventSlice helps you put together all the pieces for a great event. Looking for a unique venue? An event Planner? Great DJ? Florist? Save time and money with a one stop hub!

EventSlice allows venue owners and private home owners to post their venues for event rentals increasing their bottom lines and adding money to the home owners pocket. EvenSlice is the platform to find event professionals to can help with their event needs. With EventSlice you can find a venue, dj, photographer, and caterer! This solves the problem now of everything being segmented and not easily accessible.

EventSlice will make throwing events of all types, weddings, birthdays, and event corporate parties easy with no hassle! This will make throwing destination weddings and events easier with the ability to connect and communicate with professionals in a given area within one single platform of communication!
